🎉 Thank You!

Your patience and support made this major update possible. It’s been a long time coming, but the app is now faster, more stable, and more flexible.

Here’s what’s new:

💻 Complete Code Overhaul
Everything has been rewritten from scratch for better stability and performance. The interface remains familiar — you won’t get lost!

🎨 Flexible Appearance Customization
Customize the app’s theme to match your style. Experiment with colors and make the app truly yours!

🔗 Deep Link Integration
Instead of a Tasker plugin, I’ve added deep link support. This opens up automation possibilities in any app or workflow!

Important Notes:


📱 Landscape Mode Temporarily Disabled
It’ll return in a future update. For now, enjoy a polished portrait experience without surprises!

🌐 Updated IP Detection Logic
If you used this feature, please review your settings — everything can be reconfigured.

Need to Know:


🛠 I Develop This App Solo
I’ve tested everything thoroughly, but if you spot a bug, let me know! Your feedback is crucial for fixes.

Thank You for Believing in This Project!
Your support inspires new features. If something feels off, reach out. Let’s make this app perfect together!
